product_analysis.product_description: ShareID offers an Authentication-as-a-Service (AaaS) solution that focuses on real-time, privacy-first identity verification without storing personal or biometric data. It aims to replace traditional multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods with a more seamless and secure process. The core idea is to create a reusable digital identity linked to government-issued IDs. Users initially verify their identity through ID and face capture. Subsequent authentication is simplified to a real-time face verification (e.g., a smile), ensuring secure access and transactions without compromising privacy. ShareID targets businesses seeking to enhance user experience, improve security, and maintain compliance in online identity verification.
core_features: Real-time Identity Verification: Verifies user identity in real-time using facial recognition.
Privacy-First Design: Does not store personal or biometric data, ensuring user privacy and compliance with data protection regulations.
Reusable Digital Identity: Creates a digital identity linked to government-issued IDs for simplified future authentication.
Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) Replacement: Offers a more secure and user-friendly alternative to traditional MFA methods.
Fraud Detection: Employs AI-driven fraud detection capabilities to identify and prevent fraudulent activities.
Seamless User Experience: Provides a smooth and intuitive authentication process for users.
Compliance: Helps businesses comply with relevant regulations regarding identity verification and data privacy.
technology_stack: AI/Machine Learning: Utilized for facial recognition, fraud detection, and identity verification.
Cloud Infrastructure: Likely hosted on a cloud platform for scalability and reliability (specific provider not found).
Biometric Authentication: Employs biometric technology for face capture and verification.
Security Protocols: Implements robust security protocols to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.
API Integration: Offers APIs for easy integration with existing business systems and applications. (Specific API details not found)
